en-US.title: Ask for Directions
en-US.description: Learn how to ask for directions.

phrases.phrase: How do I get to the station?
Can you show me the way?
Can I have the menu, please?
Could I get a glass of water?
I would like to buy this.
Can I have a receipt, please?
What time does the flight leave?
I need to check in my luggage.
Can I get a window seat, please?

en-US.description: Learn common phrases for a restaurant.

phrases.phrase: Could I see the wine list?
I’ll have the steak, medium rare.
Can we get the check, please?
Do you have any vegetarian options?
What would you recommend from the menu?
Is there a special for today?
Onde fica o hospital mais próximo?
Você pode me mostrar o caminho?
Posso ver o menu, por favor?
Onde fica o portão de embarque?
Posso ver a lista de vinhos?
Eu quero o bife mal passado.
